name: Concept-map
body:
What do you think about having a place to go where everyone is talking about the same thing all at the same time.

Now think about how you get around.
### Some people walk. 
### Some people ride a bike.
### Some people take the train.
### Some people drive.
### Some people likes to ride the bus.
### Now We have uber and lyft The taxi competitors. 

Now Think about the being able to complain about those services.
### Annoying drivers
### Smelly, Hot, and Too Cold, vehicles
### Uncomfortable Seats
### Constantly late buses or too early buses?

Perks
### Get notified if you bus will arrive late or early.
### Get a news feed about the things that are currently happing in on local bus routes.
### Get Hot topics about the day.
### Get Trending topics of the day.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
